description:
Having trouble coming up with the right mix of posts? Don’t know what to say or don’t have the time to post it? Is social media becoming too much work?

This workshop will cover everything you need to know about creating killer content for the top social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, and Instagram!

In this class you will learn:

-A content mix- how to balance sales posts versus engagement posts
-Custom content for social media platforms- learning how to tailor a message to fit the platform since the same message doesn’t work for every social media platform!
-Schedule content to post automatically
-Build a content calendar and more!

You will leave this class feeling confident about posting to the top social media sites. You also receive a FREE content calendar template to get you started!
title: Social Media Content Creation
